ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Interconnect_module_cavity_surface is a type of .
the reference_surface specifies an for the Interconnect_module_cavity_surface.
The reference_surface shall not be this Interconnect_module_cavity_surface.

ext_description.p: An Interconnect_module_cutout_segment_surface is a type of . An Interconnect_module_cutout_segment_surface identifies a segment of the cutout surface of the for fabrication and assembly purposes.
ext_description.note: This data is usage view contextual data.
ext_description.p: If a design view is provided and this member of Interconnect_module_cutout_segment_surface is specified by a member of in the role of , a member of shall be the only possibilities permitted to be specified for the role of for that member of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the end_vertex specifies the final for an Interconnect_module_cutout_segment_surface.
the start_vertex specifies the initial for an Interconnect_module_cutout_segment_surface.
the composed_surface specifies the for an Interconnect_module_cutout_segment_surface.
The end_vertex shall not be the start_vertex.
An Interconnect_module_cutout_surface is a type of a that is completely through the material of the in the .

ext_description.p: An Interconnect_module_edge_segment_surface is a type of . An Interconnect_module_edge_segment_surface identifies a segment of the edge surface of the for fabrication and assembly purposes.
ext_description.note: This data is usage view contextual data.
ext_description.p: If a design view is provided and this member of Interconnect_module_edge_segment_surface is specified by a member of in the role of , a member of or a member of shall be the only possibilities permitted to be specified for the role of for that member of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the end_vertex specifies the final for the Interconnect_module_edge_segment_surface.
the start_vertex specifies the initial for the Interconnect_module_edge_segment_surface.
the composed_surface specifies the for the Interconnect_module_edge_segment_surface.
The end_vertex shall not be the start_vertex.
An Interconnect_module_edge_surface is a type of . An Interconnect_module_edge_surface identifies the edge surface of the for fabrication and assembly purposes.
An Interconnect_module_interface_terminal is a type of .

ext_description.p: An Interconnect_module_primary_surface is a type of . An Interconnect_module_primary_surface identifies the primary surface of the for fabrication and assembly purposes. A member of shall be populated in order to associate this object to the primary if a design view of the substrate is included in the data. An Interconnect_module_primary_surface is an approximation of the real primary surface.
ext_description.note: It is not usually the case that the physical material visible on the surface of the substrate or pcb is the same material as that of the primary . The level of information provided by this object is usually sufficient for assembly purposes, but will be in error by the thickness of the above the primary . If more accuracy is desired, the population of may be queried to determine the that is specified by only the attribute. That will be the material of at least part of the surface of the substrate. Full three-dimensional representation capability and location of individual associated by to the component feature being assembled to the substrate is required to represent exactly the mating conditions.

ext_description.p: An Interconnect_module_secondary_surface is a type of . An Interconnect_module_secondary_surface identifies the secondary surface of the for fabrication and assembly purposes. If a design view is populated, and correlation to a is provided, the associated with this member of shall be the last in the design.
ext_description.note: The , , and provide supporting data needed to resolve the position of the in the design. Because the secondary surface is derived structurally from the primary , there is no approximation made in the description.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
An Interconnect_module_surface_feature is a type of . An Interconnect_module_surface_feature is one of an , an , or an , or an , or an , or an , or an .
An Interconnect_module_surface_feature identifies a surface of the for fabrication and assembly purposes, particular to support .

ext_description.p: the associated_definition specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_surface_feature.

An Interconnect_module_terminal is a type of . The Interconnect_module_terminal may be an or an . The Interconnect_module_terminal identification is provided by the attribute inherited from . The string may include a substring that indicates to a person the connector the Interconnect_module_terminal is associated with. An Interconnect_module_terminal may be referenced by a member of to identify a connection requirement for the .
ext_description.note: The Interconnect_module_terminal may be an but this fact is not structurally captured in this application object due to the need to require that the Interconnect_module_terminal shall be one of the two specified subtypes.

This part of ISO 10303 does not explicitly model, in a usage view, the relationship of a printed connector to an in addition to the associated_definition relationship provided in this Application Object.
ext_description.example: Figure 1 illustrates a detail of a usage view that shows an Interconnect_module_terminal that is a part of a edge finger connector.

ext_description.p: the associated_definition specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_terminal.

the terminal_connection_zone specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_terminal. There may be more than one for an Interconnect_module_terminal. The terminal_connection_zone is optional and need not be supplied if the source system does not contain the data. If the source system contains the data, then the data shall be provided.
ext_description.note: The specified by the terminal or mounting feature may be the same that is specified by the associated . In this case the whole terminal is the .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: An Interconnect_module_terminal_surface_constituent_relationship is a type of .
the related specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_terminal_surface_constituent_relationship.
the relating specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_terminal_surface_constituent_relationship.

An Interconnect_module_usage_view is a type of . An Interconnect_module_usage_view may be a . Either the maximum_thickness_over_dielectric_requirement or the maximum_thickness_over_metal_requirement shall be provided. If both the maximum_thickness_over_dielectric_requirement and the maximum_thickness_over_metal_requirement are provided, the maximum_thickness_over_metal_requirement shall be greatere than the maximum_thickness_over_dielectric_requirement.
the implemented_function specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_usage_view. The implemented_function need not be specified for a particular Interconnect_module_usage_view.

the located_thickness_requirement specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_usage_view. There shall be one or more for each located_thickness_requirement. The value of this attribute is optional and need not be specified for an Interconnect_module_usage_view.
the measurement_condition specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_usage_view. The measurement_condition need not be specified for a particular Interconnect_module_usage_view.

the maximum_thickness_over_dielectric_requirement specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_usage_view. The maximum_thickness_over_dielectric_requirement need not be specified for a particular Interconnect_module_usage_view. The maximum_thickness_over_dielectric_requirement references a base dielectric and not final finish dielectrics.

the minimum_thickness_over_dielectric_requirement specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_usage_view. The minimum_thickness_over_dielectric_requirement need not be specified for a particular Interconnect_module_usage_view. The minimum_thickness_over_dielectric_requirement references a base dielectric and not final finish dielectrics.

the maximum_thickness_over_metal_requirement specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_usage_view. The maximum_thickness_over_metal_requirement need not be specified for a particular Interconnect_module_usage_view.

the minimum_thickness_over_metal_requirement specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_usage_view. The minimum_thickness_over_metal_requirement need not be specified for a particular Interconnect_module_usage_view.
At least one thickness property shall be provided.
A Located_interconnect_module_thickness_requirement is a definition that states, at a specific location, that a thickness requirement for an .

the design is an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Located_interconnect_module_thickness_requirement is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Located_interconnect_module_thickness_requirement as its . There shall be one or more for a Located_interconnect_module_thickness_requirement.
the minimum_thickness_requirement specifies the that is the lower bound for the Located_interconnect_module_thickness_requirement.
the maximum_thickness_requirement specifies the that is the upper bound for the Located_interconnect_module_thickness_requirement.
the reference_location specifies the role of the for the Located_interconnect_module_thickness_requirement.
The combination of the design and the reference_location shall be unique within a population of Located_interconnect_module_thickness_requirements.

ext_description.p: A Pcb_usage_view is a type of that provides the information necessary to include the in its next higher level assembly for design and some simulation purposes, but may not include sufficient information to reproduce the Pcb.
ext_description.example: Some of the information in figures 2 and 3 that communicate fit tolerances may be included in a usage view.
